comment: RUN! The only thing I will say positive about her is that she at least has empathy. She never answers emails, very little explanation of assignments, and gives examples of the assignments that are outdated. The first month of this course was very easy, but when group work began it was HORRIBLE. Also, she has only graded like 2 assignments so far.

Rarely answers emails, and due dates for assignments are very unclear. She gives lots of major time-consuming assignments with vague instructions and provides the most group work I have ever had for an online class. She also never grades assignments. This class has been a lot more difficult than it should be, and I will not be taking her again.

She responded to emails maybe once a month if ur lucky, assigned you group projects worth a significant portion of the grade without providing any details on how to contact them, and grades everything late November so u don't even know ur grade until it's too late. This class is pretty senseless so ur better of getting a teacher who makes it easy.
she is an amazing professor, she gives clear instructions and plenty of time to work on the assignments. and she is even willing to help you to pass the class with a better grade.

Professor Morgan is great! I am taking her class online and she is very fair. I am taking all online classes due to covid and she is by far the best communicator out of all my professors. Her quizzes are hard. However, if you bomb the quiz and you communicate with her she might even let the class retake it! Happened a few times.
rating_tags: Accessible outside class--Get ready to read--Caring

comment: She is nice and clear, cares about students. If you don't like her, you are probably a heavy procrastinator  because you must do the HW, HW is not too much but it is required to pass.

Amazing teacher. Willing to work with and help students! Very clear on instructions, and if shes not and you can argue a valid point she will again work with you to get it sorted out. Easy to contact and work with, cares about the material. Refreshing hybrid course.

She's a great teacher that's very interested in the content. She can be a bit scattered because she teaches a lot of classes and there's a lot of homework. Most of it is just busy work and she works with students to bring the workload down to a manageable level each week.
